title: Designates the dog control officer of the city of Salamanca as a peace officer
summary: Designates the dog control officer of the city of Salamanca as a peace officer for purposes of enforcing article 26 of the agriculture and markets law and issuing appearance tickets pursuant to article 7 of such law.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the criminal procedure law, in relation to designating dog control officers of the city of Salamanca as peace officers
